website_summaries.verdict: This wallet's magnetic closure has both pros and cons, but overall it's a trim, attractive option for a low price.
pros: Features a slim design with 4 magnets that keep contents secure
Fits up to 6 cards and provides RFID blocking
Made of genuine leather and available in several colors
cons: The downside of the magnets is that they can demagnetize cards if cards aren't placed properly in the slots
Cards are a bit difficult to remove
Loose stitching is possible over time

website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a money clip wallet with various color options will find their match in this solid model.
pros: Money clip uses 4 magnets rather than 2, unlike other brands
cons: Cards can be difficult to reach
A few buyers had issues with the strong magnet destroying magnetic strips on their cards

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet. Comes in a small nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Comes in a small nice packaging. Holds all my cards, id, business cards and dollar bills. Seems very sturdy and it has a very strong magnet. Check out my video. It’s about 17 dollar bills in it and it does not move when you shake the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Meadowsd1

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and transferred all my cards into the new Napa Walli. All my Cards fit nicely. The card slots by the money clip are extremely snug making it somewhat difficult to remove them. I rather a snug fit than too loose though. Overall I'm pretty happy with it, a bit larger than my old Duluth wallet.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I came from the traditional billfold and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I came from the traditional billfold and didn't think I would like the magnetc clip. Its great. The fit on the cards is too tight, but.. im giving that some time to losen.
customer_reviews.author: Austin D. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to what is promised
customer_reviews.text: the wallet / money clip is very cheaply made. it's claim that the magnets will hold 30 bills folded over is either a misprint or an outright lie. it MIGHT hold 3 bills folded over. spend you money on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Eichhorn

customer_reviews.title: Small package but holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great. I used a money clip before but if would pop off if it was too full. This takes up a little more room in my pocket but is still very small, and it holds more money/cards than I'll ever need. Very convenient to access all your things, and no, the magnets did not ruin my credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a WALLET that WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best overall wallet I have ever had! Not only does it meet and exceed the manufacturers claims it does so much more. It’s slim design allows you to fill it up without the feeling of having a brick in your back pocket. I have 13 cards in it and 8 business cards and the magnetic bill not only handles cash but also handles additional business cards. Buy it and you’ll never go back to a traditional wallet.
customer_reviews.author: WEMAY3

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist wallet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I love the fact that I don’t feel the weight of my wallet now. The magnet is strong and holds a good amount of bills. I read in other reviews that the magnet messed up their cards but I think that’s because they placed the cards on the magnet. I haven’t encountered that issue yet. This is my first minimalist wallet and I got to admit I like the change so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Frausto

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Had a bunch of different slim wallets and when this one sees it's last day I'll buy it again. Holding up nicely and the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: LINY

customer_reviews.title: Ruined all my cards! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the one star reviews!! I have literally had the wallet for ONE WEEK today, went to use it and non of my cards work! The magnet will strip all your cards! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: V.Falletta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful magnet, wrecked all my credit cards with in one month
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dean Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Quality is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I had little hopes when I ordered this, I have been unable to get away from the bulky wallet. This is great, fits many cards and keeps cash on hand. I like the front wallet as its easy to keep in the front product. The quality feels amazing for the amount paid. Might order another one just in case this one wears out in a year. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: JustMeEP

customer_reviews.title: This wallet sucks. By the time you put everything in it ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet sucks. By the time you put everything in it its just as big as a bi fold wallet but now your stuff is exposed and can fall out. I threw it in the trash and bought a real wallet. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Was extremely impressed until I had to replace EVERY card I had
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this wallet when he got it. He still like but every credit or debit card or anything with a magnetic strip as become useless and we had to replace every single one of them. He put them in the card sleeves like the instructions said to and still the magnet for the money clip destroyed all of them. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone unless they dont carry cards at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Will Florance

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the demagnetization
customer_reviews.text: The leather is nice and it fits a lot of cards in a tiny package, but eventually this past week two of my credit cards were demagnetized. I ended up cutting off the magnetic band so it no longer will hold any cash but will still hold cards without demagnetizing them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brady

customer_reviews.title: This is a poorly manufactured product. I have found ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly manufactured product. I have found glue seeping into one of the slots for credit cards. As a result, it became almost impossible to remove a credit card because the glue had secured it to the slot. I have twice had to remove the glue residue from the card with nail polish remover. Very dissatisfied with this product. Would not make this purchase had I to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! Aside from the quality which, really is up to par to those of real genuine expensive leather wallets... the amount of slots and build is really good and sturdy, heavy duty. I always get asked where I got this wallet, due to the fact that it really is slim, thin, compact, and has a lot of slots. People, both men and woman always, always ask me. It's convenient, the cards are tight in their slots at first... but thats with any other wallet when new. Over time, these did loosen up, which made it even smoother and easier, faster to take the cards out, which made me love it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Javii Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Must have small fingers.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but if you have non infant sized fingers with Spider-Man grip then good luck getting cards out of the wallet. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: D-why-lan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a bi-fold wallet and wanted to go more minimalist yet. This is perfect. I haven't had any issues with the magnet deactivating any of my cards, which was my big concern. I just make sure to not set a card directly on top of the magnet. It holds a solid amount of bills, you'll have an issue if you carry around a big stack of bills, but if you do then why are you looking at this wallet? It has held up very well and still looks great after a year! It is tough to get your id out of it at times, but i rarely have to. GET THIS WALLET! Super good price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight money clip with card slots
customer_reviews.text: I have used a money clip as a front pocket wallet for more than forty years. My previous one lasted more than twenty years but finally the stitching gave out so I decided to replace it, I searched and searched for an exact replacement to no avail. The "Toughergun Genuine Leather Magnetic Front Pocket Money Clip Wallet ", was as close as I could find. It is everything I wanted in a money clip with one exception, it is a bit large, yet per descriptions online it was the closest in size to my old one. Over all, I have had it for a couple of weeks now and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: bobwinder

customer_reviews.title: He loves this wallet ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his new wallet he uses it everyday! The clip works great. It’s definitely a quality product and the price was well worth it. He has no complaints about this purchase! He’s had it for over a month now and it’s holding up great. Definitely will last a long time. Fits perfectly in his front or back pocket too! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Delivered on time(pre-pandemic) and I even think it’s cute. Has enough room for his Driver’s License and bank card as well as a few credit cards and also cash of course. No complaints! So happy with this wallet 💯😊😊😊So if you’re reading this, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: B & L

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a back pocket wallet guy all my life. I have been dealing with the uncomfortable butt bulge and damaged credit cards for absolutely no reason. I decided to make a change and purchased this front pocket wallet. What a fantastic change!! This wallet has plenty of room for your cards and the magnetic money clip is strong and sturdy. Being able to carry this wallet in the front pocket is incredibly comfortable and I don't have to worry about my cards getting damaged. I should have made the change years ago! The quality and price of this wallet is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sands

customer_reviews.title: Thin wallet, Napa leather variants have plenty of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: So these wallets are all relatively the same design, but the material you pick determines who made the wallets. The napa leather have a 2 extra pockets under the ID sleeve and card sleeves compared to the other ones. They're thin, the magnetic clasp holds a fair number of bills very well, and it's easy enough to pull cards from and slide back in. For the price, you're not finding anything else better for slim carry. Perfect for motorcycle jacket pockets, fanny packs, or even back pockets on tighter jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Thefoodman52

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, bold red color, and thought-through design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband who has been looking for a wallet that would fit his needs and preferences but couldn't find it. I accidentally saw this and thought to give it a try. The pros are from my hubby: - The magnet is indeed strong to hold several folded bills - There is a convenient pocket on the other side of the wallet for ID cards which has a little window that helps to get the card out - The leather is of good quality (and I hope will last a while) - It's RED! (He likes red color and it was great to find a red colored wallet of such good quality)
customer_reviews.author: Zee Gimon

customer_reviews.title: 3 star review
customer_reviews.text: Reason for 3 star review! The item is great but I had a problem with putting my driver license inside the holder. Ever time I take out my license it would leave a black sticky glue on my license! And would also take a minute or two to remove the license because the amount of glue that was used to keep this plastic fused to the wallet! Also the license window isn’t clear, so you can’t just show it as seen in photo. But that is my only complaint, I winded up buying a new wallet 5 days after to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger than anticipated but still great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my old wallet that had been damaged pretty badly and this fit the bill. I really like it although it is just a tiny bit wider than I would like. But I must say, i love that it can hold so much, much more than I need. And the clip for cash has so far proven to be plenty strong for me. Not that I really have all that much money for it to hold... but it is excellent so far. I also really like the ID window and its easy access.
customer_reviews.author: adidab14

customer_reviews.title: Color is way lighter than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The color is so much lighter than the pic. It looks like a light taupe. So beware if you're really set on a particular leather color. I included a pic of my watch band and the wallet to show the difference. I bought this wallet thinking it was going to match my watch band. Not even close. I'm pretty sure this wallet color doesn't match the one pictured for sale. As far as the other features, the clip is strong and it's much slimmer. No worries about cards falling out because it's definitely snug overall. I gave it one star because I was definitely disappointed with the color mismatch.
customer_reviews.author: jscrubtex

customer_reviews.title: The quality and practicality is great.
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this design of front pocket wallet years ago and won't be without one. This one has great features, holds viewable ID window, a magnetic money holding system, hold multiple credit cards. I also have a metal business card holder that I use for additional credit cards which is held right to the wallet by the wallet magnet a feature that wasn't designed for that purpose but works very nicely. I was always needing to flash my id for various purposes and this makes it a snap. It cuts down on pickpocketing as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dame

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing! ...But watch out for hotel keys
customer_reviews.text: This wallet / moneyclip is awesome. It encourages me NOT to hoard a bunch of cards and receipts, and it allows me to keep cash without losing it. The one downside... you'll have to get a lot of hotel keys re-made if you travel a lot. The magnet in this wallet will destroy a hotel keycard. It doesn't kill the cards in my wallet like my ATM card etc., but for some reason hotel keycards are extremely delicate. Without fail I'll put them near this wallet, or in the same pocket, and POOF! They're effectively pieces of lifeless plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Doogie

customer_reviews.title: Love it and hate it
customer_reviews.text: I love: magnetic money clip ID window look and feel RFID blocking (have had zero issue w/ cards being affected) I hate that the cards behind the money clip are VERY hard to get out. You have to somehow grab the card with the tips of your fingernails and try to pull it out from a tight-fitting pocket. I've been using the wallet daily for the lat 4 months, hoping the situation would ease up as the wallet broke in, but nope - still a problem. If there was some way to push the cards out this would be my favorite wallet. As it is, I'm shopping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Strong money clip and very well made
customer_reviews.text: The magnets work great. The magnets hold well with as many as 10 bills folded in half. I say "as many as" simply because that's all I have had in it. It would probably hold with more. The pockets hold enough cards to be useful. With several credit cards, insurance cards, my keycard for work, my license and cash it's still nice and thin. Fits well in my front pocket. Craftsman ship seems great. Nice soft leather, good strong stitching. I think it's going to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Danskine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slim wallet/money clip
customer_reviews.text: If you want a wallet that is not bulky this is the one to get! Make sure you buy the one with the see through part you can stick your ID in. My husband lost his first one (that had the see through part) and bought another one thinking it would be the exact same but he selected the one without the I’d holder part. He still loves it, but it’s more convenient with the clear slot for ID! Truly an ideal wallet for men! Oh and the magnet has not deactivated his credit card with this one or the other style!
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good value
customer_reviews.text: A little early in ownership for a through review, but they seem insistent on one. It's a basic wallet, but that is what I was looking for . I needed an item like this as I'm a 68 year old lady who travels alone. I needed something that doesn't scream "mug me, Mug me" with a wad of credit cards & money. My main stuff is stashed elsewhere. I can't say it will meet my needs until later next month when I'm travelling . The money clip isn't super strong and I like that, it will only hold my "flash cash" a couple of twenties, five's, ten's , one's. It appears to handle that nicely. I will update this later.
customer_reviews.author: texgal

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!! Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet if you looking for minimalist wallet. It's great in quality and the magnet clip is sturdy. I wouldn't go putting alit of loose money in it, just a few bills. Holds everything nice and tight. Please remember when using these types of wallets, they do tend to stretch. So keep that in mind when purging contents over time. It's not the sellers fault. Purchased the blue, and it's really nice color. Not too bright. Gentleman don't be worried it will look too girly. Great but!!!
customer_reviews.author: gail swinford

customer_reviews.title: Works well - except it demagntized my NYC Metrocard
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size, holds the cards I need and a little cash. The money clip is worthless, very week and does not work for bills. It has a magnet, which isn't strong enough to demagnetize my credit cards and ATM card, but it did demagnetize two NYC Metrocards. So I now keep them in a protective sleeve that just fits into one of the slots in the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but right ID slot
customer_reviews.text: Been using this walker for a month and really enjoyed it. The color is slightly different than what I expected but not bad overall. I love all the different areas you can stick things and the money clip has a very strong magnet on it that gives a nice solid click noise when engaging. My one complaint is the ID slot is super tight making the ID difficult to get out. I’ve tried taking it in and out to loosen up the slot but it has made no difference at this point.
customer_reviews.author: KurtisWH

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice in pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I like this front pocket wallet because it’s thin enough to carry even with cards and drivers license in window view features. Add cash securely with magnetic money clip and your good to go. Also protected lining to block card readers. Like the feel of the genuine leather. I picked the black crazy horse leather and love it. Fits nice in front or whatever pocket you want to carry it in. Cards are snug but then again you don’t want them to fall either.Would buy again. Nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Howe

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It is a little right at first but once you break it in it’s awesome. It’s snug enough we’re your card don’t go flying out. I’ve had it for several months and I still love it. The magnet is very strong and can actually hold quite a few bills. When I have no cash in it (most of the time). It’s fun to flip it back and forth Ha. Great wallet totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this wallet. Like many, I came from a bifold wallet and I love the switch! The liner of the inside pocket in the picture ripped after about 10 months. Think about how many times you pull your card in and out of it a day. I was going to contact the company and ask what the warranty is but then I realized a new one was only like 10 bucks. After a year the plastic wasn't cloudy, the credit card slots were still tight, and the magnets were still strong. Besides the inner pocket, the condition was flawless. I would HIGHLY recommend this for anyone! If I could rate it 10 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Highly Durable: Have had this wallet for nearly a year now and noticing zero issues. Highly affordable and overall excellent quality wallet. Plenty of slots throughout for storage. One of the easiest 5 star reviews I have ever given.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his wallet. There is enough room for his license and debit card. It will hold a few folded bills but I would say no more than 7. The magnet would just not hold that many together but we never carry cash anyways. So no issues at all here. He has had this wallet for a while and still loves it. No wear or tare so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is getting away from the "back pocket wallet", as he calls it. It is gorgeous and well made. He was excited when I surprised him with it. It holds a lot. The only drawback is the magnet. While it works great, he is a master diesel technician. So every time he leans against the truck, he has to pry himself off. Which was 100 times a day. He still loves it and doesn't want to exchange it for anything else. And the magnet is just as strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grutzmacher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. It’s slightly larger than some minimalist wallets but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It’s slightly larger than some minimalist wallets but it allows me to hold all of my cards and a bit of cash. It’s also still slim enough to be a front pocket wallet...that’s where I carry mine. The pockets are situated nicely so you can easily get cards in and out. The magnets that hold the cash are very strong and can pass through multiple bills folded. Do make sure you read the directions about not storing cards between the magnets so that they don’t demagnetize your debit or credit cards. Very nice wallet, well made, practical, and I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Quipster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted when I don’t need to take a purse. Feels like genuine leather, discribed perfectly. Another happy Amazon customer!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannek

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wallet, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up at a great price of $5.99, it is still worth a higher price. Seems well constructed, money clip has a very strong magnet to hold bills and the DL is clearly visible. I'm only carding 8-10 cards very well. I'm sure you could add a few more but I did no want to bulk it too much. Will definitely purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: trc

customer_reviews.title: Slim but cards can be hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slim profile wallet that I never had to open. This was perfect. Nice and slim, and a magnetic money clip where nothing will fall out of it, which is great. The only thing that bugs me is that it's REALLY hard to remove your credit cards from those top 3 sleeves. U May need to break it in or try to stretch it out so the cards are easier to remove. Other than that it's a solid wallet and I was able to fit 5-6 cards with a VERY easy to remove ID SLEEVE. Solid buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ScottyBones

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Compact easy carry in Front Pocket ID Card Slot is nice and clean, with a durable plastic Was about to fit - ID, 5xCredit Cards, Insurance Card and Lever Gear Card Tool without issues Money Clip Magnet is very strong can easily hold 10 large bills Leather material is nice and soft so molds nicely to front leg and pocket Cons: The magnet is super strong do not place and magnetic strips near it or inside it. 8-9 Cards maximum storage
customer_reviews.author: Hiral Patel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY 💕
customer_reviews.text: I love my "little secret" At first I feared the cards would slide out while I am moving around but even while shaking it before hand (got to make sure 😝) they all stayed put. The magnet is amazing to hold it in place as well and after weeks of use, ..... more worried to lose everything else but not the wallet or cards. - Holds 6 Cards (maybe more?) and some bills easily 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Attitude

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Haven't had any issues with the magnetic money clip being up any credit cards. Magnets on the clip are fairly strong. I can use them to hang the wallet on magnetic surfaces or to secure the wallet through jeans. Did notice some glue residue on a few cards right after I recieved thr wallet but it came off with little effort. Thr color is great but does scratch fairly easy. However I feel it gives it a rustic turn look not a cheap look. Overall I highly recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MarcAnthony Murillo

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently lost his wallet, and I think he mourned the loss of the actual wallet versus everything in it. So glad that Amazon still carries it in so many color options! This wallet is great for someone who doesn't keep a ton on them. My husband carries a few cards and his ID and that's usually it, so this slim, light weight wallet is his favorite. Now to add a tracking device to it...
customer_reviews.author: AKG

customer_reviews.title: my opinions
customer_reviews.text: I've has this wallet for a couple months now kinda looks like I've had it for years. I first bought one like this that wasnt leather and within a year it was done. in my opinion i like that old look that it's become. some treading has come off or sticking out.this wallet is normally in my front pocket with my phone. I would recommend this wallet if you dont expect it to continue to look like new after afew months
customer_reviews.author: Thomas/sam Milhoan

customer_reviews.title: Slim good clip but too difficult to get cards out
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a week at this point so I might give this a little longer but really leaning to return to old wallet. The primary reason for this is that I have not found a way to get a card out without significant effort and there is no way for me to get out a card that isn't in the top most slot without removing all the cards. It might seem like I am harping on the easy of removing cards but I make 95% of my purchases with cards and rarely have more than $40 in cash so it needs to be easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Money clip wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a Money Clip type of wallet. I always used regular bi-fold wallets. Once i lost my wallet this last time, thought i'd give this a try. Pro's: The looks of it look awesome. Leather feels awesome and looks of quality. Strong magnet. Con's: It is a bit hard to take some of the cards out, from the slots were the magnetic holder are at.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Nice! For years I have been using a hairtie to hold my ID, a few credit cards, daily receipts and cash together. I am super minimalist. When I received this wallet I was afraid it was going to be a little too big after unboxing it. While it is slightly more cumbersome than my old setup, I am very happy to report that I am pleased with the multiple pockets. It makes organizing my small accumulation of stuff I need to carry much easier. It looks real nice also, much classier than a hairtie.
customer_reviews.author: Drew D

customer_reviews.title: Holds onto the credit cards
customer_reviews.text: The card slots on this wallet are much too tight. There is no way to get a card out quickly, you must dig and fumble and that takes too long in a checkout line. Also, the money clip thing on the back catches easily on things and then the paper money falls out. Other than these issues, it's a nice wallet made of decent materials. We returned this and bought elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jannacker

customer_reviews.title: Just a little gift but a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Pocket Money Clip for my husband, and I made a great choice. His was just worn out and I had been carrying it for him with his insurance cards and DL while he was hospitalized for the last 3 months. He is very picky about his money clip but really likes this one. It has such a strong magnetic closure and room for just the right number of cards he carries. I like the leather and the color. I am well pleased I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. I loves the thin wallets & is always on the search for one that fits nicely. This one fit the bill! He has been using it for a year & loves it. Holds a few cards -- clips a few paper bills & is not bulky- well until you over stuff it with receipts! He would recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a great price on a lightning deal. Coming from a typical bifold wallet, this style is new to me it's way smaller profile than unam used to. I really only use a couple of cards and rarely carry cash so this was a perfect solution instead of carrying around an overloaded brick. I think it could use a hole to connect to a chain or something. I punched a hole in the corner of mine and added a metal grommet so it looks like it's supposed to be there.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: don't like that the id portion is matte and not clear. the magnets are strong enough to hold quite a few bills securely but kinda in the way being on the side that hold your cards.. it has a pocket in the middle to hold cash as well. next time i'd just prefer to get one without a money clip
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact wallet
customer_reviews.text: Preparing for a family trip I ordered this money clip for my husband to tuck into his cargo pants. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived and it was such a wonderfully made product! It’s now back in my “To buy: list for next Christmas for the rest of the men in the family! This is a 5 star product made of top quality leather! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SJ, the honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: STILL IN LOVE WITH THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in January 2019 I am now writing a review in March 2020. I’m going to start off by saying this is an absolutely great wallet. I’m in love with that style I have no issues it’s keeps my stuff safe, everything is easy to access. Has enough room for everything that I need to store meaning no extra junk in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN O.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect. It forced me to clean out my old wallet and only carry what I need. I love how small it is and how tightly the credit cards fit in the slots. The magnetic clasp is a great way to keep cash safe and the material is very durable. I'd recommend this to any guy who wants a different way to carry cash/credit cards in the 21st century.
customer_reviews.author: TomTom

customer_reviews.title: too tight
customer_reviews.text: great design, but can't get credit cards in and out without breaking fingernails and even then ...
customer_reviews.author: SCF

customer_reviews.title: No disadvantages. Five stars.
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I went from a pretty good front pocket wallet to this front pocket wallet. I transferred everything from my old wallet to the new one, and the new one was thinner when full than my old one was when empty. It’s actually so thin that at first, I kept thinking I’d forgotten my wallet when it was in my pocket the whole time. Plus, I was able to put some of my business cards in the center section, the magnet on the money clip is really strong, and the pockets are secure.
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I don't have amazon prime and yet this wallet came very quickly. Also, it was nice that it came in this very professional looking case. The material is a great quality full grain leather and the magnet for the money clip is real strong. There are 6 credit card slots (although one slot may be used to hold coins), ID slot and a money clip on this piece. Thanx for this wonderful buy!!
customer_reviews.author: lovelife

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet for my husband because he likes thin wallets, he has used it for about a year now and it doesn’t even look worn
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Quality Built but doesn't save space
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try one of these wallets as they seem to be smaller than your standard bi-fold wallet. I took everything out of my existing bi-fold wallet and placed all items in the Napa clip. Dimension or space wise, It feels very similar to a tri-fold wallet. Overall I think it is a very well built wallet. Your credit cards, cash, driver's license are only so small to the design of the wallet doesn't decrease the bulk in your pocket. You just have to carry less.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: NapaWalli advertises that their magnets can hold 30 bills nice and secure but I tried to hold 30 and the magnets wouldn’t even get close. Then I tried 15 bills and they did connect but a couple shakes and the magnets break loose and your cash goes everywhere. The wallet is good don’t get me wrong but the cash magnet is falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Basinbot20

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best front pocket wallet I’ve ever had and I’ve used them for over a decade. The magnet is very strong, which is a must with this type of wallet. When you remove this from your pocket the magnet stays in place, and so will your money! Cheaper wallets use weak magnets that fly open sending your money all over the place. Buy this one, it’s the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: P. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of the magnet. I was afraid it would "de-magnetize" my credit cards. Hasn't been a problem at all. I even had a hotel key in it for a weekend and with removing the hotel card from the wallet and returning it many times, no problem at all. This is my first front pocket carry wallet and it fits in my jeans with no problem. You do have to prioritize what cards you carry, because if you put too many in, they become difficult to get out. The magnet easily holds 10-15 bills and holds firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made, During the next generation change I think it would help if there was a "half-moon" or "thumb" cutout on the uppermost slot on each side - to make it a little easier to get those cards out. I've had it less than a week, so mybe it will stretch out a little. I don't want it so "loose" that cards would fall out, so I think with more use it will stretch a little. I'm happy with the color choices, and the quality of the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: MikeE

customer_reviews.title: Lose the magnet
customer_reviews.text: Seller great. Wallet very attractive. Feels good in my pocket. However, the magnet money clip demagnetized my card key, no matter which slot it was inserted in. Good thing that I didn't put any bank cards in it! Makes one wonder if the RFID blocking part actually works. Sadly, I returned it to Amazon for refund.
customer_reviews.author: AW13

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and just as safe as it appears
customer_reviews.text: I didn't rate security features, because I don't know what that would encompass. But this little wallet holds my money very securely. I've had as many a 7-10 bills folded under the magnet at one time. The window pocket makes removal of the drivers license simple and easy. And the construction is very good-- my wallet is showing no signs of wear or coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eckman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable well-made wallet I keep in the inside pocket of my domain hoodie vest I also got on amazon. Has gone threw the wash a few times now and still going strong and keeps everything still working which is the true test of a wallet, right? I've had this go threw three different heavy duty washer and dryer rinses and you cant even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits
customer_reviews.text: 1. Nice quality 2. Holds many around 10 Credit Cards or other cards. 3. Money clip is a good idea BUT if I was to redesign ...either MORE MAGNETS or a STRONG CLIP
customer_reviews.author: gmc505

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design on this money clip. I thought I was going to have trouble with the clip holding paper currency, as it has some rigidity and a magnet, but I have found there are no problems. It holds the currency perfectly. I used an all metal money clip for the past 12 years, but tying to jam the credit cards and other cards in the slide in high tension clip would cause damage to the cards. This gives you individual slots to place you cards, which is much better
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Durably made Red color is easier to spot in carryon bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds my credit cards snuggly but not too tightly. Easy to get out of pouch. Red color is vibrant and easy to spot after stuffing into my carryon bag for TSA inspection. Small compact size in front trouser pocket, not too bulky. RFID is a non issue for me as I've never had a problem. But of to is another level of protection, I'm all for it. Great wallet !!!
customer_reviews.author: J in KC

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm really picky when it comes to wallets or money clip wallets. This one exceeded my expectations. I like the ones that have an ID window, and several slits for credit cards, but not too many. I want my wallets thin. The best part is how strong the magnet is. I usually worry that the clip won't be strong enough, and your bills will fall out. That's not a problem with this wallet...your cash is secure!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this wallet! I bought the light blue one and it's gorgeous. The magnet for holding money works perfectly and I love the slim design. I've had it for a little more than a month now; it's been tossed around, stuffed in my pocket, backpack, dropped to the ground an innumerable amount of times, and it's still really beautiful and shows no wear or tear. I love it. Plus, when it came in the mail, it came in a neat little box and I could smell the leather the second I took the lid of the box off. A great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this for me and I love it! I don't use it as a front pocket wallet, but I do like the slim design for carrying in my back pocket. I like that it is RFID blocking and has a clear pocket for my ID. The magnetic money clip works great and hold plenty of bills and the dark brown and slightly worn look of the leather is great! Overall, I am very pleased with this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than it looks like, strong bill magnet
customer_reviews.text: Used to use a billfold that would constantly expand to Costanza sizes. Used this instead to minimize back issues from sitting on a big wallet. This wallet holds more than I expected. There are 4 or 5 separate slots and the bill clip will hold a big old chunk of cash, I've had maybe 10 bills in there with no issues with the magnet holding. Nice soft leather that wears nicely as you break it in. Good construction quality. None of the bad smell of cheap leather or anything like that. Good wallet at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: OBWK

customer_reviews.title: Love it until the magnets stopped working 8 months later
customer_reviews.text: Had for 8 months and then overnight the magnets stopped working and my money was falling out with only 4 bills. Pulling the bills out, the flap still had a hard time staying closed. Amazon has an issue with their site on this one as you can not exchange. Had to call customer care and still had issues getting this addressed.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel but not as strong as others
customer_reviews.text: It feels really nice and feels better than the Alpine Swiss or Viossi but the magnet isn’t as strong as it should be and that’s where it fails for me. It will fit quite a few cards and has a center pocket, so if you’re looking for nice feel on the leather but won’t carry but a couple bills it could work.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Compact and holds several cards
customer_reviews.text: This compact wallet is exactly what my husband needed. It carries all the cards that are needed. It is nice looking. The only downside is that if you carry lots of cash the clip won't hold all the bills . I don't believe anything but a money clip holds that many separate bills anyway. Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet that does not bulk you down.
customer_reviews.text: It’s super nice and the feel of leather beats nylon every time. There’s lots of rom for all my essential cards; that being said, I had to leave out a few. No problems with demagnetized cards... so those of you who had card problems must’ve been doing something wrong. You shouldn’t use the clip to hold your cards! It’s to hold all your Benjamins (and the other guys, too).
customer_reviews.author: Mark McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. I have a ridge and a fantom and I prefer this over those. The magnetic money clip held $400 in $20 no problem at all which is amazing. It’s also big enough to hold my hunting license and my 2 or 3 other items and still be light in my front pocket. This thing is a bargain at $50 but at $13 or whatever I paid it’s the best value in wallets out there. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wallet. Looks better in person than in the photo. The magnet is as strong as they say it is... securely holds a thick stack of bills. All in all a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fnu Lnu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for RFID
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work to block RFID, at least not for my place of employment. I didn't buy if for that specific reason so I don't mind. There are 6 slots for cards plus an ID window. The magnet works well enough for the amount of cash I have carried in it (not many bills since I primarily use debit). It looks sleek and is not bulky in my front pocket. Fairly minimal, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Esterdahl

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Tough Leather Magnetic Money Clip
customer_reviews.text: Seeing his dad had a very similar one for the last 15 years and it wears like iron, we bought him this one; so he would discontinue carrying a wad of money in his pocket. He absolutely loves it. The added benefit of having a place to have his credit card and driver's license a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: Love the Color, the magnets are very strong, plenty of pockets,...but that's where it stops (for me) The slots/pockets where you put your items are not really that roomy, once you fill them with your essentials,... Credit, Debit Cards, IDs are alike than they start to get tight and hard to get them out without a struggle,...(especially at check out time in line...LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Versatile Minialist Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is an excellent option for anyone looking for a simple yet versatile minimalist wallet. The main thing I was looking for that other wallets did not have was a money clip option. I don't often carry cash but when I need to, other wallets with a simple pocked was not sufficient. This wallet comes with a powerful magnet that holds together a big wad of cash. It also provides easy access to your cards and most importantly, fits well in my back pocket (wasn't too bulky). On top of that, you cannot beat the value. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of my large bitfold wallets some time ago but really bought this wallet for the magnetic feature to hold bills that I carry around. It really does a great job at holding at least 15 bills without being too bulky and I also store some rewards cards in its sleeves. I'm just hoping that the magnet doesn't affect those cards but time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Adam

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get my license out of the wallet. It catches and snags. When I drop my wallet the magnetic clip opens and lets my money fall out..... I little disappointed and the leather is already tearing and wearing when I have barley used it and I don’t put it in my pocket I carry it... but I still long it all the more
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Magnet is weak
customer_reviews.text: The magnet for the money clip is weak. I had a previous one where the magnet was much stronger . On my recent wallet, the bills in the clip easily fell out when removing the wallet from a pocket. I did not experience this with my prior wallet. Maybe I just got a weak magnet in this wallet and others may be fine like my previous one. My recent one was a big disappointment because I like the slimness of the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Awesome Design
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this on a whim so that he had a thin wallet that takes up less space in his pocket. It really is a nice size for going out to a sporting event because it’s less bulky than a regular sized wallet. I ordered another one for my son because he’d rather not have a large wallet inhis pocket. It will fit about 6-8 credit cards and the built-in money clip is of good quality and it is positioned well for quickly taking out cash to pay for anything. Fantastic design!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.  Scoff Keel

customer_reviews.title: Good budget wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Works good as a slim wallet, magnet holds bills well, have not experienced color fading as others have mentioned. Overall for the price I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hernandez and Marilyn Vega

customer_reviews.title: The perfect front pocket wallet !!
customer_reviews.text: This is, to this day, the best wallet I’ve ever had. It holds way more than you think. There is a few day break in period but I carry several cards for work/personal. I hate bulky wallets or front pocket wallets and this one is NOT bulky at all! Love it! Will rebuy IF I ever wear it out !!!
customer_reviews.author: Starclassic24

customer_reviews.title: A role model to other wallets
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what love was until I got this wallet. I’m a girl with simple tastes. I didn’t need any of those designer cutches or gaudy newborn baby sized women’s wallets. Just something simple to hold my cards and cash. This wallet did that and more. It feels like it will withstand the test of time. I feel like I’ve committed a crime by paying the price I did for this amazing wallet. It’s surely worth hundreds of dollars but I got it for less than 11? I’ll take this secret and this wallet with me to my grave as both will last longer than I on this earth. Bravo lads.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Very upscale wallet and awesome packaging for a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, what a nice gift! The packaging, from the outside of the really nice, sturdy little box, past the up-scale tissue, to the pad between the magnet and the rest of the wallet is just perfect. It looks and feels very high end. I had to carefully unwrap it to get to the prize and the actual wallet is just as perfect as the presentation. It was the only thing my husband wanted for his birthday - Thanks! :-)
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I really like that I could condense everything I have to have into this clip and put it in my front pocket, my wallet was hurting my sciatic nerve and making it uncomfortable to sit and do things such as drive, now I can sit comfortably and wear shorts and not have that hip pocket full and it thwarts pickpockets and high tech thieves as well, all around good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Litteral

customer_reviews.title: Really great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stocking stuffer for my husband and he loves it! It enables him to keep his credit cards and cash in his shirt pocket for ease of access and safe, but he still carries his wallet in his pants pocket "out of a 50 year habit"! Looks beautiful, nice quality, soft leather.
customer_reviews.author: JanisW

product_meta.title: Toughergun Genuine Leather Magnetic Front Pocket Money Clip Wallet RFID Blocking(crazy horse coffee)
product_meta.description:
YOU WORK HARD FOR YOUR MONEY: That’s why we use 4 Rare Earth Magnets (instead of 2) to hold on to your cash. We tested the rest and now you can buy the best. Rare-Earth magnets were developed in the 70’s and are made from alloys of rare earth elements. They are the strongest type of permanent magnets.



WE MADE THIS ONE OURSELVES: After testing the competition we knew we had to develop our own Money Clip. Finding the right factory wasn’t easy but once the prototype was completed we knew we had a winner using Full Grain Napa Cow Leather, detailed stitching and secure card slot holders.



SIZE and FEATURES: The wallet is 4”x 3” and fits nicely in your front pocket. Comes with 3 card slots, 2 larger slots and an I.D. holder



RFID Blocking Wallet: Tested for 13.56 MHz Frequency in which the credit cards operate.125 KHz Proximity Cards, RFID signals are NOT blocked.
feature_bullets: YOU WORK HARD FOR YOUR MONEY: That’s why we use 4 Rare Earth Magnets (instead of 2) to hold on to your cash. We tested the rest and now you can buy the best. Rare-Earth magnets were developed in the 70’s and are made from alloys of rare earth elements. They are the strongest type of permanent magnets.

WE MADE THIS ONE OURSELVES: After testing the competition we knew we had to develop our own Money Clip. Finding the right factory wasn’t easy but once the prototype was completed we knew we had a winner using Full Grain Napa Cow Leather, detailed stitching and secure card slot holders.
SIZE and FEATURES: The wallet is 4”x 3” and fits nicely in your front pocket. Comes with 3 card slots, 2 larger slots and an I.D. holder
RFID Blocking Wallet: Tested for 13.56 MHz Frequency in which the credit cards operate.125 KHz Proximity Cards, RFID signals are NOT blocked;
